rukus.text: wama hadhihi l-hayatu l-dun'ya illa lahwun walaʿibun wa-inna l-dara l-akhirata lahiya l-hayawanu law kanu yaʿlamuna
fa-idha rakibu fi l-ful'ki daʿawu l-laha mukh'lisina lahu l-dina falamma najjahum ila l-bari idha hum yush'rikuna
liyakfuru bima ataynahum waliyatamattaʿu fasawfa yaʿlamuna
awalam yaraw anna jaʿalna haraman aminan wayutakhattafu l-nasu min hawlihim afabil-batili yu'minuna wabiniʿ'mati l-lahi yakfuruna
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ʿala l-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba bil-haqi lamma jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina
wa-alladhina jahadu fina lanahdiyannahum subulana wa-inna l-laha lamaʿa l-muh'sinina
